name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Medium.com - Member views in story stats

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you have a lot of stories on Medium.com, it becomes time-consuming and complicated to manually open each story to check how…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you have a lot of stories on Medium.com, it becomes time-consuming and complicated to manually open each story to check how many members have read it. With this little extension, you'll be able to quickly target the ones that should be monetized.

Easy to install

1. Open your https://medium.com/me/stats page.
2. Click on "Start calcul members views"
3. Wait few second or minute depend on your number of story.

The extension will open each of your stories and add the number of members who have read it directly to your “Your story stats” page. Then it will be easier to determine which url should have the “PayWall” activated.
